member.name: T:Microsoft.Office.Excel.Server.Udf.UdfClassAttribute
member.summary: Marks a class as a user-defined function class.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Office.Excel.Server.Udf.UdfClassAttribute.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Office.Excel.Server.Udf.UdfMethodAttribute
member.summary: Marks a function as a user-defined function (UDF) method.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Office.Excel.Server.Udf.UdfMethodAttribute.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Office.Excel.Server.Udf.UdfMethodAttribute.IsVolatile
member.summary: Specifies whether a user-defined function (UDF) method is volatile or non-volatile.
member.returns: false if the UDF is non-volatile; otherwise, true. The default is false.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Office.Excel.Server.Udf.UdfMethodAttribute.ReturnsPersonalInformation
member.summary: Specifies that the user-defined function (UDF) method may return information based on the current user executing the session.
member.returns: If true, Excel Calculation Services makes sure that the thread's current principal has the right value before calling the UDF. If false, Excel Calculation Services hides the user identity. The default is false.
